CSL_DssVidPipeAlphaCfg Struct Reference
IP » DSS CSL-FL » DSS Video Pipe CSL FL

DSS Video Pipe Alpha Config parameters. More...

#include <csl_dssVideoPipe.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t globalAlpha
 
uint32_t preMultiplyAlpha
 

Detailed Description

DSS Video Pipe Alpha Config parameters.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CSL_DssVidPipeAlphaCfg::globalAlpha

Global alpha value from 0 to 255. 0 corresponds to fully transparent and 255 to fully opaque

uint32_t CSL_DssVidPipeAlphaCfg::preMultiplyAlpha

The field configures the pipe to process incoming data as pre multiplied alpha data. FALSE: Non pre multiplied alpha data TRUE: Pre multiplied alpha data
